casebody.data:
Darryl ATKINSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 29, 2016.

Robert T. Rimmer, assigned counsel, Old Saybrook, in support of the petition.

Harry Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Darryl Atkinson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 901, 137 A.3d 120 (2016), is denied.
